oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Virginia Hunt reimbursement records of supplies and property taken during the Civil War
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Requests for reimbursement by Mrs. Virginia Hunt. After the war, Mrs. Hunt filed for reparations for things taken both by Federal and Confederate soldiers during the war. Reimbursement documents were folded together in a yellow envelope. The documents came from the estate of John W. Hunt. Originals in the Hardeman County Archives.
